message: Let's start with a fair share, Bob. Accept this and we can end the game early.
You're starting high, Alice. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I'm not going to give you the majority of the money.
Let's split it 50/50, Bob. It's a fair deal, and we can end the game now.
I'm not convinced that 50/50 is the best deal. I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you have all the power.
I'm willing to give you the majority of the money, Bob. Let's wrap this up.
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not going to let you take advantage of me now. I'll give you a bit more, but not that much.
I'm running out of time, Bob. I'll give you the majority of the money if you accept this deal.
You're getting close to the deadline, Alice. I'm not going to give in now. I'll give you a bit more, but I'm not going to let you have the upper hand.
I'm running out of time, Bob. This is my final offer. Take it or leave it.
You're really running out of time now, Alice. I'm not going to give you the majority of the money, but I'll give you a bit more than before. Take it or leave it.
This is my final, final offer, Bob. Take it or leave it. I'm not making another offer after this.
It's too late for your final, final offer, Alice. I'm taking what I can get now. This is my last offer.
